website_summaries.verdict: A powerful blend of nine essential oils that works quickly to ease even the toughest cluster migraine headaches.
pros: Can use in a diffuser or apply it directly to skin
You'll notice improvement in your headache within minutes
cons: Can sting your skin if it is not diluted first
Some find the scent to be overly minty

customer_reviews.title: Great--but keep away from cats
customer_reviews.text: Great for migraines! It really does help. Just remember that wintergreen and peppermint are toxic to cats, so please be careful using this product around your furry friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kicked my migraine's butt
customer_reviews.text: I regularly suffer from migraines. Was looking for a natural healing method, as opposed to a prescription. Gave this a try. I had a terrible migraine about a month ago. I mixed this with 100% Coconut carrier oil, and rubbed on my feet at bedtime. Woke up the next day without my migraine. Wow. What a great feeling. And the oil on my feet felt nice too ! This will be an oil I keep on hand regularly. As a side note, I have several other Edens Garden oils--they are all terrific.
customer_reviews.author: M. Guay

customer_reviews.title: Synergic Blend to Ease headache pain
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great blend of essential oils for headache relief. My favorite ingredient is lavender for relaxation. Some of the other essential oils help with lowering inflammation to relieve pain.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Bruns

customer_reviews.title: Are you kidding me?  It's so small!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in how tiny it is. I received it and immediately asked for a refund...I like my Rocky Mountain Oil's Migraine Support much better! This is a picture of it compared to my other headache oil...what a size difference!
customer_reviews.author: Sheriann

customer_reviews.title: Roll on version is weak vs actual head ease
customer_reviews.text: I guess the roll on is too diluted. I got the undiluted essential oil version of this and used it to make one and it works better than the roll on
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Plus the smell is wonderful! Everything I have gotten from Edens Garden has ...
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from migraines on a daily basis and wanted to try some natural ways to ease my pain. I found that I am very receptive to different smells and this specific essential oil has been a life saver. It not only calms you but it helps to relieve your headache pain! It does not take my headache pain completely away but it makes the pain manageable on a day to day basis. Plus the smell is wonderful! Everything I have gotten from Edens Garden has been great! It also shipped faster than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Wright

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work - Buy bottles instead!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used the regular (non-roll-on) Head Ease essential oil bottles and they worked wonders on my headaches. However, this roll-on oil seems to be less potent than those other bottles or I got a dud, because the roll-on head ease I bought isnt relieving my headaches even one bit! I recommend buying the bottles and not the roll-on!!
customer_reviews.author: ZoeyLynn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased 4 bottles of this stuff works great for my husbands migraines. We have them everywhere for quick access.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This little jewel right here has helped with my headaches! I use it in my necklace Diffuser, and when I get home from a very stressful day I use in my Diffuser in my bedroom. Just a few drops and head aches seems to slowly vanish. Used it many times and still have lots let. Awesome Product.
customer_reviews.author: Carla B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works just as well as the more expensive brand! Smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: C.L. Stocks

customer_reviews.title: Smells awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Helps me with headaches and allergies. I carry it in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: bluejoie

customer_reviews.title: Product in Roll on didn’t work like drop bottle
customer_reviews.text: So I first bought this is the drop bottle form and LOVED IT! Bought it in the roll on form and I doesn’t have the cooling pain relief affect for some reason. I still love the product but for some reason the roll on product didn’t work. I’ll just purchase in the drop bottle from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: bad tension headaches
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oil for, my daughter who, suffers from, bad tension headaches. She has not used it yet but, I, have.. It took away most, of my, headache.. The oil is thin so it came out too fast and I wasn't fond of the smell
customer_reviews.author: roez

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I get chronic headaches. Love this oil, a natural alternative to immediately taking a medication.
customer_reviews.author: Gayl

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I had a headache when I went in for a massage. My therapist used a great smelling oil that immediately started to ease my headache. I asked her what it was and it was this! Now I can use it at home or work when I start to get a headache. It even works great when applied to achy muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for headaches and congestion
customer_reviews.text: Best smelling “head ease” type oil I’ve tried. Seems to make my migraines and/or congestion headaches more bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Best oil!
customer_reviews.text: Worked right away!! Even my daughter who gets really bad migraines said it helped her within 10 minutes! Will definitely be buying this again!!
customer_reviews.author: Coffeegirl

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, just didn’t work for my migraines like I hoped it would
customer_reviews.author: Deanna R

customer_reviews.title: Headache relief
customer_reviews.text: Huge help for my headaches and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Brazell

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful in easing headache pain
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this blend with Coconut oil for help when I feel an onset of a headache. Works great if I use it at the start of a headache.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff we use this before we go to bed to help prevent waking up with headaches
customer_reviews.author: IG.

customer_reviews.title: My clients love this minty blend
customer_reviews.text: My clients love this minty blend! I use it in the beginning of my massages and it’s a big hit
customer_reviews.author: ZEM

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic migraines and this has replaced my medicine due to me not being able to be on it with pregnancy/ nursing Best product ever !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this oil! I use it most days in my necklace diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Candi Baker

customer_reviews.title: Really love this essential oil for my migraines
customer_reviews.text: I really like the head ease synergy blend essential oil by Edens. It has a subtle smell to use in my diffuser amd my roller ball when I have my migraines. The hint of spearmint is what I like the most. Product was delivered when promised. I will reorder from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have migraines and this works better than any other EO's I have tried. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: becky terry

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: My go to for headaches! I don’t leave home without this
customer_reviews.author: Destinee

customer_reviews.title: Great for easing headaches
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend gets really bad headaches. I got this for him and it works well. We are grateful for it.
customer_reviews.author: missbekah78

customer_reviews.title: ... for the same amount I could have found a better price.
customer_reviews.text: Did not know it w as a smaller size for the same amount I could have found a better price.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Roark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and service from vendor. Will definetely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, been using it instead of pharmaceuticals. It help relieve pain 4-6 hours
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Borderline pleasurable scent,  but effective
customer_reviews.text: I have been maxed out on nsaids for chronic headaches for as long as I can remember and I no doubt experience rebound headaches as a result. This blend has allowed me to start to break that cycle. The aroma is overwhelmingly minty but a bit of this diluted blend massaged into my temples does alleviate pain.
customer_reviews.author: TallJane

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This really helps with headaches, and I have also used it on sore muscles. Just a small amount on the back of the neck, behind the ears, or on the temples gives quick pain relief from my tension headaches (even headaches due to hangovers!) The scent is a bit strong - I can tell there is definitely peppermint, but there is something else in it that makes me not like the scent over all. However, since it works so well, I will continue to use this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: soothes my migraines
customer_reviews.text: So I get really bad migraines. When I am getting a migraine, I roll this on my forehead, roll a cool jade roller over it, put on a cool pack, and take some pain killers. It would not take away the headache on its own, but it definitely provides some relief and comfort while I'm waiting for the medicine to kick in. It smells very nice, and is a great addition to my migraine arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: Not the most amazing smell on Earth( a little goes a long way) but this oil works 98% of the time with my very strong and very regular migraines. I've suffered from extreme migraines for many years and this oil blend has really made a difference. Whether I put some in a diffuser right away or in the middle of my migraine and soon after the oils hit the air I can feel a difference. Thank you! P.s. be sure to use a carrier oil with this if you're planning on applying it to the temples or neck or any area of your skin. If not, it will burn and be very unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Kaiulani

customer_reviews.title: Headease Oil + heat= magic
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic not just for headaches, but for pain in general, and the anxiety that accompanies it. I wanted to share my use of it in hopes that someone can benefit. I heat up a microwaveable heat wrap, then put two or three drops on each end and drape it around my neck. Between the heat and the scent, there is just something magical and so very helpful there. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: 4Treasures

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Migraines
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Head Ease due to my severity of Migraines I get. I work from my home and I am at my computer a lot. I wanted something natural to apply to help ease my migraines. I am unable to take prescription meds the Doc prescribes due to the fact they make me into a zombie. I purchased to give it a try. I have started using essential oils and they help a lot. You can feel this working within 15mins after applying to my temples and the base of my neck. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Savymom13

customer_reviews.title: It works...
customer_reviews.text: Yes definitely 100% I use it, I've used it on my 8 year old daughter and I've gotten my sceptic friend to use it, now she wants a bottle. Use it on the onset of a headache or hangover, I rub on temples and across my forehead and dab behind my ears. I also sniff the bottle here and there if it's really bad. This is a tried and true product. I definitely recomend.
customer_reviews.author: My Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Head Ease Essential Oil
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this blend before and have been pleased... however, I do not like the roller form. It is too diluted and I can barely smell the product when I put it on my temples and wrists after an application. I will go back to the no roller product as it more potent for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Highest Quality Essential oils on Market Duffision ready Soaps and candles
customer_reviews.text: Quality oils with free shipping now. Quality oils for diffuser or candles or soap making. I have a full collection at this point and company has amazing service and satisfaction guarantee! Absolutely love these oils!
customer_reviews.author: Amy L.

customer_reviews.title: This works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from headaches and/or migraines on a regular basis..almost daily! I'm trying not to take so many medications so I ordered this product. It works really well! It helps ease my pain and makes the headache/migraine more tolerable. At times, it goes away completely. Definitely recommend this product!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amalia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasant and calming
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful essential oil which seems to be calming and helps my stress headaches
customer_reviews.author: M. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Beats Young Living!!
customer_reviews.text: Easily beats Young Living, would recommend. It doesn’t get rid of a migraine, but does keep the nausea away. And the peppermint and lavender help to keep calm & do the breathing to help with the pain
customer_reviews.author: skbh

customer_reviews.title: Meh!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't quite like this one. I deal with headaches on the daily and have for years. This doesn't help whatsoever. I've tried several brands, and the only one that even touches my headaches is the brand Doterra Peppermint Oil. I will be going back to that one.
customer_reviews.author: kristin r valle

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Exactly the blend I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Exactly the blend I was hoping for ! Helps a lot for headaches. Wonderful smell. Would order again! Only bad thing was that it arrived 4 days late, but they did contact me afterwards and apologized for the problem. I felt they were sincere and the oil is actually of very high quality. Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Star

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Does not compare to Doterra Past Tense blend! I will not buy this useless blend again as its missing a key ingredient that should make it identical to Doterra version.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Head ease really brings relief
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I discovered Eden's Garden. This oil makes all the difference for me. It doesn't cure, but it makes life bearable again. So grateful for this oil. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: It helps somewhat.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps. Doesn’t cure my chronic migraines but definitely helps in conjunction with meds ice etc.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough about this product. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this product. It is the only thing that has helped my pain. I tell everyone that is know how this product has helped me. I plan on keeping this in my medicine chest. Please give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Blue_Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works well with most headaches. It has a pleasant smell and my headache eases away after applying the oil to my temples.

customer_reviews.title: Never go without this
customer_reviews.text: This is a go to for me I have chronic migraine

customer_reviews.title: Not A Migraine help for me
customer_reviews.text: While the scent is not over powering, it's not pleasant and definitely didn't help my migraine.

customer_reviews.title: Natural remedy
customer_reviews.text: A nice comforting scent that really helps me relax and lessens my tension headaches. I keep this one diluted with jojoba oil in a rollerball and always keep it in my purse. I love Edens Garden!
customer_reviews.author: DianaMarieMTV

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: It does relieve headaches effectively both for me and my daughter. The scent is warm, spicy and astringent, I love it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Abdugafur

customer_reviews.title: Headache and tension gone in seconds 💫
customer_reviews.text: Headache and tension gone in seconds. I use a drop on the temples and sometimes on my scalp. Love Edens Garden products.
customer_reviews.author: Ambriel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. Relieves my headaches and I sleep so much better.

customer_reviews.title: you'll wish you ordered more
customer_reviews.text: uses it as needed. like the smell and put it on often.

customer_reviews.title: Massage clients get benefit
customer_reviews.text: I use this product with my clients with headache and migraines. Gives them relief with massage.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both suffer seasonal allergies and this product seems to help.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps with my migraines when I put on my temples.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good. I like peppermint better for headaches, but has a good scent.

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life!? So ...
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life!? So lovely and not too overwhelming, I'm going to get a bottle just for the office!
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much I bought it twice! One for at work, one for home.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A.

customer_reviews.title: Serious headache pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this blend. I am a YL oil user and I am sold on the efficacy of essential oils. They really do work; sometimes even better than narcotic pain meds. I bought this blend and have been using it religiously every time a headache starts to come on. I get them ALL the time and this little bottle of magic is amazing. It works within minutes of using it. Sometimes, it won't take my migraine away completely, but at least I am functioning again. I'm getting ready to order another bottle since I am blowing through this one with my constant headaches.
customer_reviews.author: NapoliMamma

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I have an headache I just dab a little on my fingers and rub it behind my ears. My headache is almost gone instantly
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Manley

product_meta.title: Edens Garden Head Ease Essential Oil Synergy Blend, 100% Pure Therapeutic Grade (Highest Quality Aromatherapy Oils- Headache & Massage), 5 ml
feature_bullets: Head Ease is your on-call helper when it comes to headaches. A mix of minty and earthy notes, this blend offers grounding clarity.

Head Ease is a therapeutic blend of Lavender, Peppermint, Rosemary, Frankincense, Basil, Chamomile, Ginger, Spearmint and Helichrysum that can offer relief from the nagging pain of headaches. When even simple tasks become exhaustive exercises, Head Ease provides an all-natural solution to help your muscles relax. Simply dilute Head Ease with a carrier oil and apply to your temples and forehead for relief.

Women-owned and family-operated since 2009, we personally source each essential oil and raw ingredient to ensure affordable prices without compromising quality. Voted the #1 Non-MLM essential oil company, it's our pleasure to be your one-stop shop for all things aromatherapy.

As the leader in the essential oils industry, we value safety, quality and education in offering only the best aromatherapy products. For this reason, we test every batch of essential oils and provide GC/MS reports to our customers to ensure each oil’s therapeutic value and purity.

Each of our products is expertly formulated and hand-poured, including over 200 essential oils and synergy blends. We also offer a wide array of natural home and body products that are kind to the environment. Have a question about essential oils? Our certified aromatherapists are happy to lend a hand in your EO journey!
